parameters.description: The UUID of the behavior group to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The UUID of the behavior group to delete

get.summary: Retrieve the behavior groups of a bundle.

parameters.name: bundleId
parameters.description: UUID of the bundle to retrieve the behavior groups for.

get.summary: Retrieve the application by name of a given bundle name
Retrieve the event type by name of a given bundle name and application name
Retrieve all event types. The returned list can be filtered by bundle or application.
Retrieve the event types affected by the removal of a behavior group.

parameters.name: behaviorGroupId
parameters.description: The UUID of the behavior group to check

get.summary: Retrieve the behavior groups linked to an event type.

put.summary: Update the list of behavior groups of an event type.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description: UUID of the eventType to associate with the behavior group(s)

get.description: Allowed `sort_by` fields are `bundle`, `application`, `event` and `created`. The ordering can be optionally specified by appending `:asc` or `:desc` to the field, e.g. `bundle:desc`. Defaults to `desc` for the `created` field and to `asc` for all other fields.

get.summary: Return a thin list of configured applications. This can be used to configure a filter in the UI
Return a thin list of configured bundles. This can be used to configure a filter in the UI

put.summary: Save the daily digest UTC time preference. To cover all time zones conversion to UTC, the accepted minute values are 00, 15, 30 and 45.
